report.title: Small Sampling
report.author: Delsymfan
report.bodytext: Just wanted to share a couple of brief descriptions of Bromo-DragonFLY experiences. /n /n BDF was received as a mistake, the vendor was selling 2C-B-FLY but instead had BDF, he subsequently died of an 18mg dose. However I had received mine prior to this event. A lab test performed by others who had this same batch confirmed it to be BDF. /n /n I dosed accurately 250ug the first time. First 3 hours went with no effects. At T+3 there was a marked increase in energy. Still no major visual elements. /n /n T+6 noted a more mental shift, being slightly dulled and focused. The overall energy buzz was still there. /n /n By T+8 visual effects had greatly increased. Effects lasted hours, but I benzo'd myself to sleep before reaching the natural end of the trip. /n /n Same goes with the 200ug experience, only less visual.
